https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3Ma3tGUbM9JrwllceaN1YyYZcOR.jpg Balettan is the story of Athaniparampil Balachandran (Mohanlal) who is known for his service in the society. His father (Nedumudi venu) is a retired postmaster. He lives with his wife Radhika (Devayani) and two children. C Balettan
